txt.en: 'Prince Théodred has routed the enemy! Victory is ours! [placeholder], Grimbold, come with me, and we will send them howling back into the Ring of Isengard! We will send them back to Saruman!'
'Hildred spoke true. There are Orcs outside the walls, but their numbers should not be a problem for us, [placeholder].\n\n'Let us see what they think of my riders!'
Instance: The Daring Strike, Mid-day

'Are you [placeholder]? You are! We have to get out of here!'

Shouts of despair and cries of terror rise from the pockets of Rohirrim still fighting for their lives. The archer looks at you with fear in his eyes and throws his bow down in the dust.

'The day is lost! There are too many uruks!'

The men begin to break for the road back to the ford, and all sense of order is lost as the uruks gather on all sides.
'We will cut through the brush on this side of the road, [placeholder], and attack our enemies' flank!'
Grimbold has been defeated
Defeated netted uruk-warriors at the gates of Isengard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Grimbold! [placeholder]!'
Defeated netted uruk-warriors at the gates of Isengard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Théodred is waiting to address his assembled men, and you should speak with him.
Prince Théodred has asked you and Grimbold to cut through the brush on the eastern side of the road to attack the half-orc flank.
Rungar has arrived on the flank of the main host, and you should speak with him.
Before the gates of Isengard, the Rohirrim led by Théodred have come under attack by an overwhelming force of Saruman's uruks.\n\nYou need to speak with Grimbold amid the chaos of battle!
'This way, [placeholder], on foot!'
The riders have netted some of the attacking uruks, and Grimbold has charged you with defeating them in order to buy time for the retreat.
'Look! The riders have begun their attack!'
'Do you hear that, [placeholder]? Someone comes! Get ready!'
'That was not all of them, [placeholder]...stay alert!'
'More half-orcs approach!'
'Archers from hiding!'
'Here comes another! And it sounds like a big one!'
'Rungar! We thought you were an enemy!'
Listen to Théodred's plan for the attack
Talk to Théodred
Talk to Grimbold at the head of the host
Follow Grimbold into the brush on the eastern side of the road and attack your enemies
Talk to Rungar
Talk to Grimbold before the gates of Isengard
'This is our chance! We have to retreat now!'
Defeat netted uruk-warriors at the gates of Isengard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Rohirrim!'
'Our foes lie before us! See them assembled outside their walls!'
'Grimbold, have your archers send our greeting to Saruman!'
Prince Théodred and his host have come to the gates of Isengard, and it is now time for his daring strike to begin.
'Tryin' to sneak around us?'
'Grimbold, take [placeholder] and attack from their flank while our riders harry them!'
'With pleasure, my Prince.'
'Archers, come forward!'
'Volley!'

'We are outnumbered, [placeholder]! The Prince has ordered a retreat, but first we must survive this attack!

'Our riders have managed to net some of our foes! Attack the netted uruks and keep them from breaking through!

'I will try to drive some of the others away!'
